title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 not working on some fields in the help search
OB: When launching Eclipse with DBCS locale and selecting the 'Search Help' option from the menu bar, pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field does not display a help pop-up screen as expected. No action or result is observed.
EB: Pressing Ctrl+F1 on the first text field in the 'Search Help' window should display a help pop-up screen containing information about the HelpSearch.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch Eclipse with DBCS locale.
2. Select 'Search Help' from the menu bar.
3. In the opened window, click on the first text field.
4. Press Ctrl+F1.

Note: This issue occurs in all DBCS languages. Cycling through other fields using the tab key and pressing Ctrl+F1 works properly for those fields, displaying the correct text.
